title: In addition to (i) above, there shall be ‘’additional area’’ for the rehabilitation of residential/r
clause_text: In addition to (i) above, there shall be ‘’additional area’’ for the rehabilitation of residential/residential cum commercial Occupants governed by the size of the CD in accordance with the Table-A below
